sentences.message: Takes responsibility for own decisions and behavior.
Its willing to admit own mistakes
Questions practices which might violate rules of fairness.
Supports the development of their colleagues. Gives frequent, detailed feedback.
Supports the develment of their colleagues.
Avoids using power when dealing with conflicts.
Brings hidden conflicts to the open. Communicates complex ideas clearly.
Listen to people who represent different opinions
Creates an inclusive environment, where diversity is recognized.
Treats everyone with equality high respect regardless of position, gender, age or nationality.
